protein.specific_function: Ileal protein which stimulates gastric acid and pepsinogen secretion. Seems to be able to bind to bile salts and bilirubins. Isoform 2 is essential for the survival of colon cancer cells to bile acid-induced apoptosis

reference.reference_text: Oelkers P, Dawson PA: Cloning and chromosomal localization of the human ileal lipid-binding protein. Biochim Biophys Acta. 1995 Jul 13;1257(2):199-202.
